page.title: 04Newquay-Tourist Attractions
page.content:
'A sparkling sun,blue sky,seven miles of golden sand and no less than eleven beaches.There is an outstanding variety:some are a mile in length, while others are small and intimate'.
Away from the beaches there is also a lot to do.There are putting greens, 'pitch 'n' putt' courses,a boating lake with motor,oar or paddle power, trampolines,a miniature railway,zoo and indoor and outdoor swimming pools.
There are long walks along the cliff tops,horse riding and sports such as tennis,squash and bowls.
Trenance gardens are very beautiful and provide an area for quiet walks as well as providing a small museum.
